org.mini2Dx.core

Interface Reflection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JvmReflection

    public interface Reflection
    Cross-platform reflection API

      • forName

        java.lang.Class forName(java.lang.String qualifiedName)
                 throws ReflectionException
        Returns the class/interface/annotation/etc. associated with the given name
        Parameters:
        qualifiedName - The fully qualified name (e.g. java.lang.String)
        Returns:
        The Class
        Throws:
        ReflectionException - Thrown when the class cannot be found

      • newInstance

        java.lang.Object newInstance(java.lang.Class clazz)
                      throws ReflectionException
        Creates a new instance of the provided class using the default constructor
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to create an instance of
        Returns:
        A new object instance
        Throws:
        ReflectionException - Thrown if the instance could not be created

                     java.lang.Object obj)
        Checks if the provided object is an instance of the provided class
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to check
        obj - The object to check
        Returns:
        True if obj is assignable to the provided class

               java.lang.String fieldName)
        throws ReflectionException

        Parameters:
        clazz - The clazz to get the field from
        fieldName - The field name to retrieve
        Returns:
        The Field instance
        Throws:
        ReflectionException - Thrown if the field does not exist

        index - The index
        Returns:
